title: PlayStation State of Play Predictions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.29.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:19 - Housekeeping
 - In case you missed it: A new episode of Game Showdown went up on Friday with Snowbike Mike making his debut for Team Greg. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - We’ve teamed up with the indie exchange for the ULTIMATE spring game showcase! The game submission deadline for the MIX/KF Spring Showcase is Feb 2nd. Head to kindafunny.com/SpringShowcase to get your game submitted.
 - The Great Mario 64 Race is up as it’s own Party Mode now!
         -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:31 - State of Play returns this Wednesday
00:31:57 - Rocksteady pulls Suicide Squad an hour into early access after players’ games ‘auto completed’
00:41:17 - What’s up with Suicide Squad reviews?
00:54:33 - Embracer Group Cancels ‘Deus Ex’ Video Game
00:58:03 - Square Enix’s Visions of Mana could be coming to Game Pass
01:00:08 - Wee News!
01:03:54 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless, Tim, & A Special Guest!
